metadata.title: CVE-2021-24115 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Botan before 2.17.3, constant-time computations are not used for certaindecoding and encoding operations (base32, base58, base64, and hex).

criterions.comment: botan1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
